tasks.name: Implement Engineer Service
tasks.description: Create the Engineer Agent service in `.core/services/engineer_service.py` using FastAPI. It should listen for 'EXECUTING' tasks, use LiteLLM to generate code, and handle file operations safely.

tasks.name: Implement Critic Service
tasks.description: Create the Critic Agent service in `.core/services/critic_service.py`. It should listen for 'REVIEW' tasks, run static analysis (linting, tests), and apply RepoReason metrics.

tasks.name: Review Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create and run integration tests to verify the full loop: IDLE -> EXECUTING (Engineer) -> REVIEW (Critic) -> IDLE.
